response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special price of $750,000. This is a significant discount from its true worth, reflecting my desire to make this acquisition accessible to someone who appreciates its true value. I believe that with your discerning eye and appreciation for quality, you would be the perfect custodian for this product. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 750000}
